name: Slate
text:
What was life like for the 10 women in RBG's Harvard Law class? We asked them and their families. 

This is the story of one professor's infamous "Ladies Day." 

Listen to more memories from RBG and her classmates here: https://t.co/uAyIg84Rsj https://t.co/QRo6gCAlnm

name: Slate
text:
We asked RBG about Ladies Day, too. "Didn't happen in my section," she said, but she had plenty of stories to tell. 

She also remembered each of her classmates clearly. 

Read a transcript of our full interview with her: https://t.co/1cvQehMot6 https://t.co/qXEbm3fDPs
